faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Answers to common queries about our services and approach.
faqs.overview: Everything you need to know about working with Sunpeak.

faqs.question: Do you work internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have deployed projects in over 15 countries.

faqs.question: What industries do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We focus on Smart Cities, Government, Healthcare, and Enterprise IT.

faqs.question: How do you handle data privacy?
faqs.answer: We are ISO 27001 certified and GDPR compliant by default.
